attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron should be sacked the bed room tax the council tax top up and other such measures are turning the Uk into a poverty ridden state where the only banks that seem to be doing good business are the food banks.
The poor are being used as scapegoats for what the rich bankers did to our country and the world.
The poor are being made to give up everything to find jobs that don't exist and when they turn to there Mr Cameron for help he does not care.
David Cameron works for all the people of the Uk rich and poor he is not doing so so should be sacked so the UK can have a prime minister who will not forget this fact that they works for us all.

rejection.details: There is already a petition calling for the PM to resign.
